thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service
thread.title_full: Great service - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: dnchambe
title: Great service
text:
We stayed at this Doubletree because it was located near the airport (about 5 miles north). The rooms were very nice and ours had a view of the San Francisco Bay. The staff was very helpful and friendly. A few days prior we had stayed at a different Doubletree in another state and the two stays could not have been more different. Here the staff went out of its way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. We reported a small breakage in our room just to let them know so they could fix it. The front desk was very apologetic and asked what they could do to make it up to us.
Room Tip: Rooms on the south side offer a view of the Bay See more room tips
